title: Question 10:
description: How to delegate claiming of SNX Rewards?

fields.title: Answer:
fields.value:
Delegate you wallet address

This step assumes you have already have a  wallet address to delegate claiming from

Go to the FeePool Contract address [on Etherscan](https://etherscan.io/address/0x94dBa784e87A3F5F12e25EC98bF14233c1e69017). 

Go to 'Contract' tab, press 'Write Contract'.

Click 'Connect to Web3' and sign in using MetaMask

Scroll down to locate 'approveClaimOnBehalf' 
 Enter your delegated wallet address in 'account(address), and press Write.

Confirm the transaction.

Your delegated wallet is now set for claiming SNX Rewards.

fields.title: Claiming  SNX Rewards from your delegated wallet.
fields.value:
This steps below assumes:

1. You have already Setup a delegate wallet and delegated it using 'approveClaimOnBehalf' method
2. You have a small amount of ETH in the wallet.
3. Your C-Ratio is > 750% at the time of claiming.
Go to the FeePool Contract address [on Etherscan](https://etherscan.io/address/0x94dBa784e87A3F5F12e25EC98bF14233c1e69017). 

Go to 'Contract' tab, press 'Write Contract'.

Click 'Connect to Web3' and sign in using MetaMask

Scroll down to locate 'claimOnBehalf'' 
 Enter the your SNX wallet address that your are claiming on behalf of in 'ClaimingForAddress(address), and Click Write.

Confirm the Transaction.

You have now claimed your rewards.
